scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Annunciation, with the Virgin Mary kneeling on the right, her hands crossed over her chest, and a halo around her head. She is dressed in a blue robe. On the left, the Angel Gabriel kneels, his wings spread, holding a scroll with text. He is gesturing towards Mary. Behind them, architectural elements suggest a building with arched doorways and windows. The background features a patterned mosaic-like texture. The scene is set outdoors with green grass and foliage.
